attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thatcher did enormous damage to the UK and adversely effected the lives of many.Using the State against the miners was deeply divisive.
Why should tax payers have to fund a State Funeral for this awful woman ? 
Have some backbone Gordon.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
